history.content:
Deadline to Add & Drop Courses is tomorrow—Friday, September 26th

The deadline to add and drop courses is Friday, September 26th at 11:59 pm.  Be sure you check-- and then double check--your schedule to be sure you have dropped all courses you don’t plan to take, and added everything  you do want to take. All changes need to be made on Tele-BEARS by Friday at 11:59 pm; there are no extensions of the deadline.    Be sure you are enrolled in a course load you can manage throughout the remainder of the semester, and have dropped all courses you don’t plan to take. Remember, you must be enrolled in the minimum number of units required by your college. 

Friday, September 26th is also the deadline for students on the Fall 14 degree list to elect to take a technical course P/NP.  Only students on the degree list are eligible to take technical courses P/NP, and Friday of the fifth week of instruction is the deadline to make that choice.

 

If you would like help making decisions about your Fall course schedule, you can speak to an adviser.

If you're in EECS:

Sarah Van Nostrand

Schedule an appointment here

203 Cory Hall

svannostrand@eecs.berkeley.edu

-or-

See your ESS Adviser 

Email your ESS adviser. 

Or you can stop by 230 Bechtel and speak with a peer adviser. 

If you're in CS:

Lily Zhang

Schedule an appointment here

379 Soda Hall

cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu 

Christopher Hunn

Schedule an appointment here

377 Soda Hall

cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu 

Or stop by the 3rd floor entrance of Soda Hall and meet with a Peer Adviser

Thursday: 11am-5pm

Friday: 12pm-4pm
history.subject: Reminder: Add/Drop Deadline is Friday, September 26th
